title: Dinosaur National Monument: Commercial Guided River Trips
body: Commercial Guided River Trips        A rafting day trip on the Green River floats towards the upturned rock layers of Split Mountain near the Rainbow Park area. NPS / Dan Johnson   Â    To truly experience the wild canyon country of Dinosaur National Monument join a guided river trip. Sit back and enjoy the scenery, while your guide navigates the rapids and rows the boat. Whether you go on a one day or multi-day trip, the memories will last a lifetime.  One-Day Trips The following companies are authorized to provide one-day trips through Split Mountain Canyon in Dinosaur National Monument.     Adrift Adventures 9500 East 6000 South Jensen, UT 84035 (435) 789-3600 (summer only) (800) 824-0150 www.adrift.com   Don Hatch River Expeditions 221 North 400 East Vernal, UT 84078 (435) 789-4316 (800) 342-8243 www.donhatchrivertrips.com     Multi-Day Trips The following companies are authorized to provide multi-day river trips through the canyons of Dinosaur National Monument.     Adrift Adventures 9500 East 6000 South Jensen, UT 84035 (435) 789-3600 (summer only) (800) 824-0150 www.adrift.com   Adventure Bound 2392 H Road Grand Junction, CO 81505 Phone: (800) 423-4668 Fax: (970) 241-5633 www.adventureboundusa.com     American River Touring Association 24000 Casa Loma Road Groveland, CA 95321 (209) 962-7873 (800) 323-2782 www.arta.org  Dinosaur River Expeditions 2279 N Vernal Avenue Vernal, UT 84078 (800) 345-7238 www.dinosaurriverexpeditions.com    Don Hatch River Expeditions 221 North 400 East Vernal, UT 84078 (435) 789-4316 (800) 342-8243 www.donhatchrivertrips.com   Eagle Outdoor Sports 2471 South 150 West Bountiful, UT 84010 (801) 382-7238 www.rafteagle.com     Holiday Expeditions 544 East 3900 South Salt Lake City, UT 84107 (801) 266-2087 (800) 624-6323 www.bikeraft.com  National Outdoor Leadership School (NOLS) 284 Lincoln Street Lander, WY 82520 (307) 332-6973 (435) 781-0305 www.nols.edu     Outdoor Adventure River Specialists (OARS) P.O. Box 67 Angels Camp, CA 95222 (209) 736-4677 (800) 346-6277 www.oars.com   Colorado Outward Bound School 5161 Sheridan Blvd Denver, CO 80212 (828) 239-2320 www.cobs.org    Sheri Griffith Expeditions P.O.
